name: lihuacat,Chinese Li Hua,Dragen-Li,中国狸花猫，貍花貓，nekolihua
description:
狸花猫，中国狸花猫，lihuacat，Dragon Li

The Dragon Li is a recently established Chinese breed of domestic cat (also called Chinese Li Hua or China Li Hua as a standardized breed, depending on breed registry). It was developed from a common landrace of cats in China, known as 貍花貓, Pinyin: líhuā māo, literally 'fox flower cat'（wiki）

This lora is trained by Chilloutmix.

Suggest using Chilloutmix to generate images, with weights ranging from 0.6 to 0.8, which may result in better images.

v1.0 All suggestions and opinions are welcome.欢迎评论和意见

the prompt you can use to specialize:

lihuacat=basic

full_body/half_body=basic

purelihua=pure colour 纯色

whitelihua=more white fur 多点白毛

changmaolihua=long-haired cats(may not work well)长毛狸花

babylihua=kitty(may not work well) 幼狸

bailingzi=white neck 白领子

baishoutao=white gloves 白手套

gold_eyes

grey_eyes

blue_eyes

black_eyes, To avoid bad pupils,use tag[slut_eye:1.5] or [black_eyes]眼睛可能有瑕疵用这个

movement：

lying,standing,sitting,running,walking

looking at viewer

looking to the side

thanks

欢迎小伙伴们支持

Blog:
Listen guys, I mainly made this lora to please a girl who likes cats.
My motivation is not pure.
But cats are innocent, hope you liked this lora.
小伙伴们，我做这个lora只是为了和一个爱猫的女孩说上话。
我不是真的喜欢一只猫，我不太配。但我是真的喜欢她，我怕我不配。
但是猫是无辜的，希望大家喜欢。
I will upload Version1.1, after I get badly hurted next time.
我会在下次伤地情难自已时更新1.1版本。
想要催更可以邮件联系我，发我狸花猫的照片。
Want to urge new version, send pictures of lihuacat
at email 1647531963@qq.com

modelVersions.name: v1.0
modelVersions.description:
初版，用五十多张照片训练

First edition, trained with over 50 photos
